LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightI.label: 骑士I型
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightI.description: 型号为骑士I型的米莉安。\n\n可以装备近战武器。
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightII.label: 骑士II型
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightII.description: 型号为骑士II型的米莉安。\n\n可以装备近战武器。
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightIII.label: 征战骑士
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightIII.description: 型号为征战骑士的米莉安。\n\n可以装备近战武器。
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightIV.label: 帕拉丁
LanguageData.Milian_Mechanoid_KnightIV.description: 型号为帕拉丁的米莉安。\n\n可以装备近战武器。
LanguageData.MiliraGun_KnightIV_Hammer.label: 飞锤
LanguageData.MiliraGun_KnightIV_Hammer.description: 帕拉丁用于投掷的飞锤。
